script: Set-Content "$dir\BlueJ.bat" (@('@echo off', 'set APPBASE=%~dp0', $jpxf, 'set CP=%APPBASE%lib\bluej.jar', 'set JAVAFX_CP="%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.base.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.controls.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.fxml.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.graphics.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.media.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.properties.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.swing.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.swt.jar;%JAVAFXPATH%\lib\javafx.web.jar"', 'start %JAVA_HOME%\bin\javaw.exe -Djavafx.embed.singleThread=true -cp %CP%;%JAVAFX_CP% bluej.Boot -javafxpath="%JAVAFXPATH%" %*') -join "`r`n") -Encoding Ascii
